member.name: T:Rocklan.SwaggerGen.Callbacks.AdditionalSchemaDocumentFilter`1
member.summary: Adds extra schemas (models) to the swagger page. Useful for callback payload objects

member.name: M:Rocklan.SwaggerGen.Callbacks.AdditionalSchemaDocumentFilter`1.Apply(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiDocument,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.DocumentFilterContext)
member.summary: Generates a schema for the supplied type

member.name: T:Rocklan.SwaggerGen.Callbacks.CallbacksOperationFilter
member.summary: Adds support for callbacks to the swagger doc

member.name: M:Rocklan.SwaggerGen.Callbacks.CallbacksOperationFilter.Apply(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOperation,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.OperationFilterContext)
member.summary: Modifies the operations section of the swagger page to add callbacks

member.name: T:Rocklan.SwaggerGen.Callbacks.SwaggerCallbackSchemaAttribute
member.summary: Add this attribute to an enum's fields to indicate it is a callback

member.name: P:Rocklan.SwaggerGen.Callbacks.SwaggerCallbackSchemaAttribute.SchemaType
member.summary: Unique type (eg, an enum's property) of this callback

member.name: P:Rocklan.SwaggerGen.Callbacks.SwaggerCallbackSchemaAttribute.ExampleAddress
member.summary: Example URL to show on the swagger page
